div.head: 脹刺
div.div: distension with [a feeling of] being stabbed

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: distension with [a feeling of] being stabbed

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with ci zhang 刺脹 , stabbing distension. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tu 兔 quoting Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 : 余血搶心，脹欲死者 , “When surplus blood rushes against the heart, this results in distension and one wishes to die”, writes: 余血搶心，脹刺欲死 者 , “When surplus blood rushes against the heart, this results in distension with [a feeling of] being stabbed and one wishes to die”.
